episodes.synopsis: Included are The Tortoise and the Hare, Babes in the Woods, The Goddess of Spring, Toby Tortoise Returns, Paul Bunyan and The Saga of Windwagon Smith.
episodes.title: Play All Six: Vol. 4

episodes.synopsis: Overconfident Max Hare reces against Toby Tortoise. In his belief that he can win the race no matter what, Max spends his time entertaining the female rabbits while persistent Toby comes from behind and wins the race.
episodes.title: Tortoise And The Hare

episodes.synopsis: Two children wandering through a forest are lured into a wicked witch's house. Now they have only their wits and smarts to escape before they are turned into woodland creatures.
episodes.title: Babes In The Woods

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Windwagon Smith lands in a Kansas town and falls for the mayor's daughter, Molly. But a windwagon soon sweeps the couple off into the skies.
episodes.title: The Saga Of Windwagon Smith

episodes.synopsis: The goddess Persephone is captured by the devil as his bride and sent to the underworld, with the agreement to return to earth six months of the year.
episodes.title: Goddess Of Spring

episodes.synopsis: Max Hare and Toby Tortoise are opponents in a boxing match. Max becomes frustrated when Toby retreats into his shell during punches. Max cheats by dumping fireworks into Toby's shell, but the plan backfires when it helps Toby win.
episodes.title: Toby Tortoise Returns

episodes.synopsis: Baby Paul Bunyan, found on a beach after a storm, grows to a great size and becomes a legend with his double-bladed ax and friend Babe, the Blue Ox.
episodes.title: Paul Bunyan

video.title: Disney Animation Collection: Vol. 4: The Tortoise and the Hare
video.synopsis: In this charming adaptation of Aesop's classic fable, Max Hare and Toby Tortoise compete in a foot race that pits speed against perseverance.
